com.maxgarfinkel.suffixTree

Class SuffixTree<I,S extends java.lang.Iterable<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxgarfinkel.suffixTree.SuffixTree<I,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The type of the item within the sequence.
    S - The sequence type, which must iterate over items of type I

    public class SuffixTree<I,S extends java.lang.Iterable<I>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A suffix tree implementation using Ukkonen's algorithm capable of generating a generialised suffix tree. The type of both character and the word can be specified, and we call these items and sequences respectively.
    Author:
    Max Garfinkel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SuffixTree()
      Constructs an empty suffix tree.
      SuffixTree(S sequenceArray, java.util.UUID id)
      Construct and represent a suffix tree representation of the given sequence using Ukkonen's algorithm.
